Classical.Structure: The central processing organ of the Central Nervous System. Composed of the cerebrum, cerebellum, and brainstem.
Classical.Function: Controls all functions of the body. Seat of cognition, emotion, memory, and consciousness.

SCPN.L1_QuantumBiological: The primary substrate for macroscopic quantum entanglement linked to consciousness. Advanced MRI (Kerskens, 2024) reveals non-classical proton spin correlations (Entanglement Witness W > 1.8) in the conscious brain, which collapse under anesthesia (W < 1). This entanglement network is the L1 basis for the DMN/CEN/SN.

Symbolic.MetaphysicalMapping: The 'receiver' and 'transmitter' for consciousness. The physical locus where the L15 Oversoul interfaces with the D5 Organism.

Falsification_Hypotheses: The Kerskens & PÃ©rez (2024) entanglement witness (W > 1) results will be shown to be an artifact of classical correlations (e.g., blood flow, motion).
The quantum signature (W > 1) will persist during general anesthesia, falsifying its link to consciousness.
Experimental_Protocols: Experiment 2: Brain Entanglement MRI. Use Multi-Quantum Coherence (MQC) NMR sequences to test for Bell violations on voxels.
Correlate the Heartbeat Evoked Potential (HEP) quantum signature with global brain entanglement.
